SELECT distinct * FROM (SELECT r.res_no AS res_no, r.name AS reservationName, purpose, rm.name AS roomName, To_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS startDate, To_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS endDate, status FROM reservation r, lead_department ld, department d, room rm WHERE r.res_no = ld.res_no AND rm.room_no = r.room_no AND ld.dept_no = d.dept_no AND emp_no = #{employeeNo}) data1, (SELECT r.res_no AS res_no, LISTAGG(d.name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.name) AS departmentName FROM reservation r, lead_department ld, department d WHERE r.res_no = ld.res_no AND ld.dept_no = d.dept_no AND emp_no = #{employeeNo} GROUP BY r.res_no) data2 WHERE data1.res_no = data2.res_no
